Name: Super Ninja Hero VR
About the game: Hero, you are not alone! 'super ninja hero vr' is a VR-FPS game(first-person shooting game) that developed by Wuhan Firegame Co.,Ltd..Variety of scenes with cool fighting, strong cunning enemies and smart boss.Taking up your arms to begin a legend. --Weapon: Hidden blade:suitable for beginners,simple and crude. Aim at the enemy, pulling the trigger and biu biu biu.... Bow:Completely imitate true archery,enjoying the pleasure of slay. --Battle: Flight with claw? Yes Fight face-to-face?Yes Escape by a walk?Yes Shoot behind barrier?Yes --Enemies: Brutal Shadow Evil and sexy Tengu is waiting for you with a team of minions in their secret base. So Are you ready? For more enjoyment,join us.
